cwitools.utils.get_arg_string¶

cwitools.utils.get_arg_string(args)¶

Construct a string displaying the arguments passed to argparse.

Parameters

parser (argparse.ArgumentParser) – The parser containing passed arguments

Returns

A human-readable version of the passed arguments, for logging.

Return type

string
